scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm i && npm run prisma:generate && npm run start:dev -- --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.start:consumer: cd consumer && npm i && npm run prisma:generate && npm run start:dev -- --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,consumer,frontend,queue,smtp -c yellow,green,blue,magenta,cyan "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:consumer" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:queue" "npm run start:smtp"
